    • Method Detail

      • login

        User login(String email,
           String password)
    throws LoginException,
           ShopException
        Login a User.
        Parameters:
        email - of the User.
        password - of the User.
        Returns:
        User object.
        Throws:
        LoginException - Custom Exception. Caught in FrontController. Sends User back to index.jsp.
        ShopException - Custom Exception. Caught in FrontController. Sends User back to /WEB-INF/customerpage.jsp

      • createUser

        User createUser(String email,
                String password)
         throws LoginException
        Create a User.
        Parameters:
        email - of the User.
        password - of the User.
        Returns:
        User object.
        Throws:
        LoginException - Custom Exception. Caught in FrontController. Sends User back to index.jsp.

      • createOrder

        Order createOrder(int id,
                  int length,
                  int width,
                  int height)
           throws LoginException,
                  ShopException
        Create an Order.
        Parameters:
        id - of the User who made the Order.
        length - of the house.
        width - of the house.
        height - of the house.
        Returns:
        Order object.
        Throws:
        LoginException - Custom Exception. Caught in FrontController. Sends User back to index.jsp.
        ShopException - Custom Exception. Caught in FrontController. Sends User back to /WEB-INF/customerpage.jsp

      • getOrders

        List<Order> getOrders(User user)
               throws LoginException,
                      ShopException
        Get all Orders from this User.
        Parameters:
        user - whose Orders you want. Usually only the User who is logged in.
        Returns:
        A List of all the Users Orders.
        Throws:
        LoginException - Custom Exception. Caught in FrontController. Sends User back to index.jsp.
        ShopException - Custom Exception. Caught in FrontController. Sends User back to /WEB-INF/customerpage.jsp

      • getUsers

        List<User> getUsers(User user)
             throws LoginException,
                    ShopException
        Get all Users. But only if you're an employee.
        Parameters:
        user - Employee. Checks if User is employee. Throws error if he is not.
        Returns:
        List of all Users.
        Throws:
        LoginException - Custom Exception. Caught in FrontController. Sends User back to index.jsp.
        ShopException - Custom Exception. Caught in FrontController. Sends User back to /WEB-INF/customerpage.jsp

      • getOrder

        Order getOrder(int id)
        throws LoginException,
               ShopException
        Get an Order by its ID.
        Parameters:
        id - of the Order.
        Returns:
        the Order.
        Throws:
        LoginException - Custom Exception. Caught in FrontController. Sends User back to index.jsp.
        ShopException - Custom Exception. Caught in FrontController. Sends User back to /WEB-INF/customerpage.jsp

      • sendOrder

        void sendOrder(int id)
        throws LoginException,
               ShopException
        Mark an Order as sent.
        Parameters:
        id - of the Order you wish to send.
        Throws:
        LoginException - Custom Exception. Caught in FrontController. Sends User back to index.jsp.
        ShopException - Custom Exception. Caught in FrontController. Sends User back to /WEB-INF/customerpage.jsp

      • getBOM

        BOM getBOM(Order order)
        Get a Bill of Materials for an Order.
        Parameters:
        order - you wish to get a Bill of Materials for.
        Returns:
        A Bill of Materials. (Stykliste)
